title: Data Description
text: datasets sourced following article: Zachreson, C., Shearer, F. M., Price, D. J., Lydeamore, M. J., McVernon, J., McCaw, J., & Geard, N. (2022). COVID-19 low-tolerance border quarantine systems: Impact Delta variant SARS-CoV-2. Science Advances, 8(15), eabm3624. https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abm3624

title: Data Description
text: breaches_data dataset contains detailed information individual quarantine breach events Australia. 39 rows 9 columns.

title: Data Description
text: data_time dataset contains aggregated information estimated quarantine risk time. 1,946 rows 4 columns.

title: Introduction to the Quarantine Data
text: get started, load package. loaded, can access datasets directly.

title: Introduction to the Quarantine Data
text: breaches_data dataset contains detailed information individual quarantine breach events Australia.
code: head(breaches_data) #> # A tibble: 6 × 9 #>      no state date       facility           case_name variant onward   vax link  #>   <dbl> <chr> <date>     <chr>              <chr>     <chr>   <lgl>  <dbl> <chr> #> 1     1 WA    2020-04-14 Duxton Hotel       Security… -       FALSE     NA http… #> 2     2 WA    2020-05-12 Pan Pacific Perth… Contract… -       FALSE     NA http… #> 3     3 VIC   2020-05-25 Rydges Hotel       Staff an… -       TRUE      NA http… #> 4     4 VIC   2020-06-14 Stamford Hotel     Security… -       TRUE      NA http… #> 5     4 VIC   2020-06-15 Stamford Hotel     Couple    -       TRUE      NA http… #> 6     5 NSW   2020-08-17 Marriot Hotel      Security… -       FALSE     NA http…

title: Introduction to the Quarantine Data
text: data_time dataset contains aggregated information estimated quarantine risk time.
code: head(data_time) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   report_date state total breach #>   <date>      <chr> <dbl>  <dbl> #> 1 2020-10-27  AUS    12       NA #> 2 2020-10-27  NSW     6.6     NA #> 3 2020-10-27  NT      0       NA #> 4 2020-10-27  QLD     0.4     NA #> 5 2020-10-27  SA      1.4     NA #> 6 2020-10-27  VIC     0       NA

title: Introduction to the Quarantine Data
code: # Breaches by state breach_summary <- breaches_data %>%   group_by(state) %>%   summarise(     n_breaches = n(),     n_onward = sum(onward, na.rm = TRUE)   ) %>%   arrange(desc(n_breaches))  ggplot(breach_summary, aes(x = reorder(state, -n_breaches), y = n_breaches)) +   geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +   labs(title = "Quarantine Breaches by Australian State",        x = "State", y = "Number of Breaches") +   theme_minimal()

what: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
title: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
text: R package provides curated datasets interactive Shiny application explore COVID-19 quarantine events estimated risks across Australian states territories. designed ETC5523 Assignment 4, also serves general-purpose educational tool understanding quarantine breaches modeled risk can analyzed time.

title: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
text: can install development version package GitHub :

title: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
text: installed, can load package launch interactive Shiny app.
code: library(QuarantineAnalysis)    # Launch the interactive application launch_app()  # You can also directly access the data head(breaches_data) head(data_time)

title: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
text: Key features include: Curated Datasets breaches_data: Individual quarantine breach events, including state, date, facility, variant, vaccination status, onward transmission information. data_time: Daily estimated quarantine risk aggregated state nationally, allowing time-series analysis potential system failures. Interactive Shiny Application Visualize monthly quarantine breaches bar chart. Explore estimated total quarantine risk time line plot. Filter state date range examine trends specific regions. Display raw data searchable sortable tables transparency reproducibility.

title: An Analysis of Australian COVID-19 Quarantine
text: full documentation website created pkgdown available : https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-laihoangson/

title: Quarantine Breaches Data — breaches_data
text: Contains individual quarantine breach events Australia.

title: Quarantine Breaches Data — breaches_data
text: tibble 39 rows 9 columns: Record number state State territory code date Date breach event facility Facility name case_name Role person involved variant COVID-19 variant, known onward Whether community transmission occurred (TRUE/FALSE) vax Vaccination status available link Reference URL report

what: Estimated Quarantine Risk Over Time — data_time
title: Estimated Quarantine Risk Over Time — data_time
text: Daily modelled estimates quarantine risk state nationally.

title: Estimated Quarantine Risk Over Time — data_time
Estimated Quarantine Risk Over Time — data_time
text: tibble 1,946 rows 4 columns: report_date Date risk estimate state State code ("AUS" national total) total Estimated total quarantine risk breach Estimated risks associated quarantine system failures (may NA)
